page.title: 14Entertainment, Gipsey Bridge
page.content:
The following information was
taken from a survey carried out by us in the village of Gipsey Bridge. Most of the entertainment in the village takes place in the home where people read or watch television.They like most of all reading history books and watching quiz programmes on the television. When they do leave the home they go for walks and think that there should be more walks here.Most people think that there should be better public transport and more places for young people to go out. It is too far for the people of this area to go out to the theatre or to a sports club but they do go to the pubs.
